name: Find Me, Avatar
description:
Trigger Warning: anxiety, depression  

Enable Full Screen and turn sound on. Click on the page for music to start. Navigate through the game slowly. 

This Twine game is about a story of first love, long-distance relationship, and letting go of that relationship (enter a name that is special to you). It then dives into deeper deciphering of one's inner fear and the cost of losing one's identity.  

Credits: 

Youtube link for Main Song: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lju6h-C37hE

Royalty Free Music Download: Slow Motion, Love
